p.text: coordinate Y upper left corner of the object.

p.textAll: Coordinates on all objects are arranged not as ordinary coordinates. The origin is not in the lower left corner, and in upper left . Thus, the Y coordinate is essentially distance from top Territory.

remarks.text: If you put an object inside another object (such as inside panel ), then the coordinates will be considered on the already this object (panel) .

sample.sampletitle: Options for the Y button at
